meanings.definition: Relating to or characteristic of teratology.
meanings.sent1: The teratological research focused on studying birth defects.
meanings.sent2: Her teratological drawings depicted imaginary creatures with unusual features.
meanings.sent3: The teratological twist in the story made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: The garden was a teratological wonderland of mutated plants.
meanings.sent5: The teratological nature of the experiment left a lasting impression on the scientists.

meanings.sent1: The teratological growth on the tree puzzled the botanists.
meanings.sent2: The old mansion had a teratological design that scared the children.
meanings.sent3: The teratological cake at the party was a hit with the guests.
meanings.sent4: His teratological behavior at the meeting raised some eyebrows.
meanings.sent5: The storm created a teratological landscape of destruction in the town.
